results.title: Changing days
results.creator_credit: Joanne Lisinska and RMIT Media Arts
results.brief_description:
Thoughtful animated work on modern city life and the desire to escape from the claustrophobic world of the ever encroaching brick walls that confine, alienate and isolate us.
Graduate work from RMIT media arts (BA Arts)

results.title: Superheroes
results.brief_description:
This performance art film features blue screen technology and the director/actor starring as every character in a parody of classic Hollywood superhero films.
Graduate work from RMIT media arts (BA Arts)

results.title: Heaps good: Muph n Plutonic
results.brief_description: This music video featuring animation was made by Melbourne-based video artist and animator, Anto Skene. ‘Heaps Good’ is a track from the first collaboration of acclaimed Melbourne hip hop artist MC Muphin and one of Australia’s highest profile producers, Plutonic Lab. Quality local production featuring hot local sounds.
